question:
[Melba] and her sister [Lucille] were arguing over a toy. While they were fighting, [Melba]'s sister [Toni] grabbed the toy, and ran off to play with it by herself. [Jenny] went to the store with her sister [April] [April] and her daughter [Lucille] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards.
Question: How is [Jenny] related to [Toni]?

- [Melba] and [Lucille] are sisters, and [Toni] is [Melba]'s sister, so [Toni] is also [Lucille]'s sister.
